segments.text: Ugh, that sink is gushing water all over the place—disgusting mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing in it, unaware, with her apron and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading, soaking the floor—how gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids climbing for cookies while everything's getting ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilting, cookies spilling—it's all so sloppy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up, probably getting crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets; this kitchen is filthy now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a clean garden, but inside it's revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing the dishes stacked near the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking treats in this state—nasty business.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene turns my stomach with its carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean this up before it's worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
